item.title: GSoC 2021, how's it different?
item.description: Google Summer of Code, or GSoC as most people like to call it has just started, and I am amazingly excited for it. Although this is not the first time I am participating in any open source program, but it's my first time with GSoC. So naturally there's this question that often people ask: how is GSoC different from others?

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my blog. This is where I write about my opinions and experiences about technology, education, new developments and other interesting topics.
